last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Glen and Kirsty find that their wedding fund is empty. With Lee on the run, Glen finally meets his brother's enemies.

name: Mr. Bigstuff
overview: Glen and his fianc√©e share a perfect, perfectly mundane life together. Sure, Glen's got crippling erectile dysfunction and Kirsty has a secret shoplifting habit, but they're happy. That is until his brother Lee comes crashing into their lives, whilst on the run from a past that's quickly catching up with him. The trio are forced together: a perfectionist, a fantasist and an anarchist all living under the same roof in an Essex cul-de-sac. It's not long before their 'perfect' lives start to unravel faster than a cheap carpet.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Glen faces chaos when his estranged brother Lee arrives to ruin his 'perfect' suburban life.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Kirsty pushes Glen to organize a Chinese meal to impress his boss, Ian, as Lee remains determined to find their 'uncle' Steve.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Glen poses as acting manager of the store and the power goes to his head. Lee starts a fight club to help him regain his mojo.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Still reeling from the fight club, Glen's promotion is ruined by a drunk Ian. Lee spills more about the men after him.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Lee realizes his past has caught up with him and takes drastic action. Kirsty finally comes clean about her shoplifting habit.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Glen and Kirsty find that their wedding fund is empty. With Lee on the run, Glen finally meets his brother's enemies.
